ChangeResourceGroup.title: ChangeResourceGroup
ChangeResourceGroup.summary: Changes the resource group of an ApsaraMQ for Kafka instance.

ConvertPostPayOrder.title: ConvertPostPayOrder
ConvertPostPayOrder.summary: Changes the billing method of a Message Queue for Apache Kafka instance from pay-as-you-go to subscription.

CreatePostPayInstance.title: CreatePostPayInstance
CreatePostPayInstance.summary: Creates a pay-as-you-go instance and returns the instance ID and order ID.

CreatePostPayOrder.title: CreatePostPayOrder
CreatePostPayOrder.summary: Creates a pay-as-you-go ApsaraMQ for Kafka instance. Pay-as-you-go instances allow you to pay after you use the resources. You are charged for pay-as-you-go instances based on the actual resource usage. You can use pay-as-you-go instances in test scenarios or scenarios in which the peak traffic is uncertain.

CreatePrePayInstance.title: CreatePrePayInstance
CreatePrePayInstance.summary: Creates a subscription instance and returns the instance ID and order ID.

CreatePrePayOrder.title: CreatePrePayOrder
CreatePrePayOrder.summary: Creates a subscription ApsaraMQ for Kafka instance. You can use subscription instances only after you pay for them. Subscription instances are suitable for long-term and stable business scenarios.

CreateSaslUser.title: CreateSaslUser
CreateSaslUser.summary: Creates a Simple Authentication and Security Layer (SASL) user.

CreateScheduledScalingRule.title: CreateScheduledScalingRule
CreateScheduledScalingRule.summary: Creates a scheduled scaling rule for a serverless ApsaraMQ for Kafka V3 instance.

DeleteConsumerGroup.title: DeleteConsumerGroup
DeleteConsumerGroup.summary: Deletes a consumer group from a specified Message Queue for Apache Kafka instance.

DeleteInstance.title: DeleteInstance
DeleteInstance.summary: Deletes an instance. You can delete subscription and pay-as-you-go instances after you release them.

DeleteSaslUser.title: DeleteSaslUser
DeleteSaslUser.summary: Deletes a Simple Authentication and Security Layer (SASL) user.

DeleteScheduledScalingRule.title: DeleteScheduledScalingRule
DeleteScheduledScalingRule.summary: Deletes the scheduled scaling policy of a serverless ApsaraMQ for Kafka instance after you deploy the instance.

DescribeAclResourceName.title: DescribeAclResourceName
DescribeAclResourceName.summary: Queries the name of the resource with which an access control list (ACL) is associated.

DescribeSaslUsers.title: DescribeSaslUsers
DescribeSaslUsers.summary: Queries Simple Authentication and Security Layer (SASL) users.

EnableAutoGroupCreation.title: EnableAutoGroupCreation
EnableAutoGroupCreation.summary: Enables and disables the flexible group creation feature.

EnableAutoTopicCreation.title: EnableAutoTopicCreation
EnableAutoTopicCreation.summary: Enables or disables the automatic topic creation feature, or changes the number of partitions in topics that are automatically created.

GetAllInstanceIdList.title: GetAllInstanceIdList
GetAllInstanceIdList.summary: Queries the IDs of all instances in the current account.

GetAutoScalingConfiguration.title: GetAutoScalingConfiguration
GetAutoScalingConfiguration.summary: Queries the scheduled scaling policy of a serverless ApsaraMQ for Kafka instance after you deploy the instance.

GetConsumerList.title: GetConsumerList
GetConsumerList.summary: Queries one or more consumer groups in a specified Message Queue for Apache Kafka instance.

GetConsumerProgress.title: GetConsumerProgress
GetConsumerProgress.summary: Queries the consumer progress of a consumer group.

GetInstanceList.title: GetInstanceList
GetInstanceList.summary: Queries the information about instances in a specified region.

GetKafkaClientIp.title: GetKafkaClientIp
GetKafkaClientIp.summary: Queries the IP addresses of the clients that are connected to an ApsaraMQ for Kafka instance.

GetQuotaTip.title: GetQuotaTip
GetQuotaTip.summary: Queries the used quota of topics and partitions.

GetTopicList.title: GetTopicList
GetTopicList.summary: Queries the information about a topic.

GetTopicStatus.title: GetTopicStatus
GetTopicStatus.summary: Queries the messaging status of a topic.

GetTopicSubscribeStatus.title: GetTopicSubscribeStatus
GetTopicSubscribeStatus.summary: Queries the information about the groups that subscribe to a topic.

ListRebalanceInfo.title: ListRebalanceInfo
ListRebalanceInfo.summary: Obtains the rebalance details of a consumer group.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are attached to a specified resource.

ModifyInstanceName.title: ModifyInstanceName
ModifyInstanceName.summary: Changes the name of an ApsaraMQ for Kafka instance. After you deploy an instance, you can call this operation to change the name of the instance.

ModifyPartitionNum.title: ModifyPartitionNum
ModifyPartitionNum.summary: Changes the number of partitions in a topic.

ModifyScheduledScalingRule.title: ModifyScheduledScalingRule
ModifyScheduledScalingRule.summary: Modifies the scheduled scaling policy of a serverless ApsaraMQ for Kafka instance after you deploy the instance.

ModifyTopicRemark.title: ModifyTopicRemark
ModifyTopicRemark.summary: Modifies the description of a topic.

QueryMessage.title: QueryMessage
QueryMessage.summary: Queries messages stored in a topic. You can query messages by creation time or offset.

ReopenInstance.title: ReopenInstance
ReopenInstance.summary: Enables an ApsaraMQ for Kafka instance.

StartInstance.title: StartInstance
StartInstance.summary: Deploys an ApsaraMQ for Kafka instance. You must purchase and deploy an ApsaraMQ for Kafka instance before you can use the instance to send and receive messages.

StopInstance.title: StopInstance
StopInstance.summary: Stops an ApsaraMQ for Kafka instance.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Attaches a tag to a resource.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Detaches tags from a specified resource.

UpdateAllowedIp.title: UpdateAllowedIp
UpdateAllowedIp.summary: Updates the IP address whitelist of an ApsaraMQ for Kafka instance. Only IP addresses and ports that are configured in the IP address whitelist of an instance can access the instance.

UpdateConsumerOffset.title: UpdateConsumerOffset
UpdateConsumerOffset.summary: Resets the consumer offsets of the subscribed topics of a consumer group.

UpdateInstanceConfig.title: UpdateInstanceConfig
UpdateInstanceConfig.summary: Modifies the configurations of an ApsaraMQ for Kafka instance. ApsaraMQ for Kafka allows you to modify the configurations of an instance, including the access control list (ACL) feature, the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) feature, the message retention period, and the maximum message size.

UpdateTopicConfig.title: UpdateTopicConfig
UpdateTopicConfig.summary: Modifies the configurations of a topic. After you create a topic, you can modify the message retention period and maximum message size of the topic.

UpgradeInstanceVersion.title: UpgradeInstanceVersion
UpgradeInstanceVersion.summary: Updates the version of an instance.

UpgradePostPayOrder.title: UpgradePostPayOrder
UpgradePostPayOrder.summary: Upgrades a pay-as-you-go ApsaraMQ for Kafka instance.
